Title: Designates all fire marshals in the county of Suffolk as peace officers; repealer
Summary: Designates all chief fire marshals, assistant chief fire marshals, fire marshal IIs and fire marshal Is employed by the county of Suffolk or a town or village therein as peace officers.
LawCode: Amd ยง2.10, rpld ยง2.10 subs 62, 63, 65, 71 & 77, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to designating fire marshals in the county of Suffolk as peace officers; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
